title: 各位在搬运的时候都是怎么和外国朋友们交流的？
author: Enron233
txt_content:
哈哈 一般我看到某个插件很好的时候，我可能先来论坛看看 然后看如果没有我就回复一句
Hello. I am a Chinese player. This plugin is very good! Can I carry it to MineCraft forum in China?你们是怎么说的呢？

replies.author: IgnizFeng
replies.txt_content: Hey gay，I wanna translate your mods.Please say yes.......(大雾)

replies.author: Enron233
replies.txt_content:
2759159258 发表于 2018-2-3 09:07
I will say:please speak Chines.e
啊哈哈哈 你这个就难为人家了

replies.author: Citysands
replies.txt_content:
Hello~This is XXX is good very much. I can take this XXX to China? 
#run

replies.author: Meteor___
replies.txt_content:
跟他说：
我不仅要用你的插件，还要把作者名字改成我，搬到中国最大的MC论坛
（233）

replies.author: 八意史蒂夫
replies.txt_content:
虽然我没有做过搬运，但是我觉得我会这样说：
Marvelous work! 
It's a pity that most Chinese Minecraft players won't see or use your marvelous work since some special reasons.
Like network problems(especially some cheap broadband, they do not have enough oversea bandwith), language barriers, etc.
Would I publicize your work in our biggest Minecraft Forum, MCBBS?
It's not for commercial use, I would not use it to earn money. I will post the original author, post, and download source, too.
I also mentioned a situation that some Chinese players don't have enough oversea bandwith before. 
Can I provide another download source for Chinese players that do not have good connectivity to your download source ? For sure, I would not earn money from it.
Everyone would appericiate your generous decision.

replies.author: soud
replies.txt_content: 英语盲的人不可能和外国人交流

replies.author: 正人君子
replies.txt_content:
Hello, I'm a fan from China, see your plugin is very good, I want to carry it to the MCBBS, let more people know your work, hope you can authorize, thank you very much if you can.

Thank you very much! Have a nice day, good-bye.
